## 1.3

```{r}
d <- data.frame(
  T = c(0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1),
  Y0 = c(5, 8, 5, 12, 4, 8, 4, 9),
  Y1 = c(5, 10, 3, 13, 2, 9, 1, 13), 
  id = LETTERS[1:8]
)

gt(d, rowname_col = "id")
```

```{r}
d = mutate(d, Y = ifelse(T == 0, Y0, Y1))
mean(d$Y[d$T ==1] - mean(d$Y[d$T ==0]))
```
